title: Could you help me change my email riot!
body:
Hey, i've been playing league of legends off and on for a very long time and since then i've lost my email account after being hacked a couple times and can no longer sign into my original email account that i started this league account on, I have used the same name for almost all my accounts and games for the past 7 years and would like to change the email associated with my league account over to one i can keep more track of, i dont know how to go about getting this done so i figured i'd make a post and maybe a riot employee will talk to me. Also if i could get my refunds back that would be awesome because i never got to use them and there are some things i'd love to refund from the past year of playing more often.
{{champion:164}}

replies.body: Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the "I need help recovering my account". After you verify yourself as the creator of the account, those agents should be able to help you get that switched.
